title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Minister for Finance) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister finance) (no 2) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sam Griffin, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Finance with effect from 26 June 2024.
text_norm: 2 sam griffin particular whose address deposited office department finance appointed special adviser minister finance effect 26 june 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
heading: 3. Shane Smyth, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
3. Shane Smyth, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the 
Minister for Finance with effect from 26 June 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [460] 3
